original_text: If you love other people, you will never do anything bad to them. So anyone who loves other people has obeyed God's Law completely.
korean_text: 사랑은 이웃에게 악을 행하지 아니하나니 그러므로 사랑은 율법의 완성이니라

sentences.original_text: you will never do anything bad to them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 결코 그들에게 나쁜 일을 하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: So anyone who loves other people
